quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易通过词根"Afro-"+"futurism"错误推导为"非洲未来的政治/科技运动"，或混淆与"Afrocentrism"（非洲中心主义）的差异
quiz_item.sentence: The movie "Black Panther" is often cited as a popular example of **Afrofuturism**, blending African cultural elements with futuristic technology and themes of empowerment.
